sentences.en: A routine scan revealed abnormalities in the foetus.
sentences.cn: 一次常规扫描发现胎儿畸形.

sentences.en: A young mother has decided to terminate her pregnancy after finding out she was carrying a mermaid-like foetus in her womb.
sentences.cn: 一名年轻的母亲决定终结自己的孕期，因为她发现自己子宫里孕育的是一个美人鱼胎儿。

sentences.en: An infected pregnant woman may transmit the virus to a foetus, leading to miscarriage and stillbirth.
sentences.cn: 受感染孕妇可将病毒传染胎儿, 导致流产和诞下死胎.

sentences.en: Gays, Lesbians and TranssexualsResearch shows that the basic template for the body and brain of a human foetus is female in its structure.
sentences.cn: 对男同性恋、女同性恋和变性人的研究显示，人类胎儿的身体和大脑基础模板在结构上是女性。

sentences.en: If the male foetus does not receive enough male hormone at the appropriate time, one of two things may happen.
sentences.cn: 如果在适当的时间内，男性胎儿没有接收到足够的雄性激素，就会发生两件情况之一。

sentences.en: In this chapter we will look at what happens when a human foetus receives too much or too little male hormone.
sentences.cn: 在这一章里，我们将看看当一个人类胎儿接收了过多或过少的雄性激素会发生什么。

sentences.en: Kuwabara is trying to give a foetus a safe home to avoid premature birth.
sentences.cn: 而桑原的目的是帮助胎儿找到安全的生长场所,以防早产.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the security of castor - oil plant in induced labor for mature foetus.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察蓖麻餐用于足月妊娠引产的有效性和安全性.

sentences.en: Perhaps we are really talking about amniotic fluid, which surrounds the foetus in the birth sac.
sentences.cn: 也许我们真正在谈论的是羊水，也就是包围着胎儿的那些液体。

sentences.en: Perhaps we are really talking about amniotic fluid, which surrounds the foetus in the sac.
sentences.cn: 也许我们真正在谈论的是羊水, 也就是包围着胎儿的那些液体.

sentences.en: Pregnant women who are heavy drinkers risk damaging the unborn foetus.
sentences.cn: 孕妇酗酒可能会危及腹中胎儿。

sentences.en: Progenitive force ebbs , stillborn foetus, strange embryo increases.
sentences.cn: 繁殖力衰退,死胎 、 怪胎增加.

sentences.en: Result: Difficulty about delivering head of foetus in new type of caesarean operation account for 10.19 %.
sentences.cn: 结果: 新式剖宫产胎头娩出困难占10.19%.

sentences.en: She didn't want to know the sex of the foetus.
sentences.cn: 她不想知道胎儿的性别.

sentences.en: Sometimes I wonder as a foetus if you fought for your life?
sentences.cn: 有时我像个婴儿一般无知,怀疑你是否为生活而战斗?

sentences.en: The child quickened in her womb , ie She felt the movements of the foetus.
sentences.cn: 她感到了胎动.

sentences.en: The Parturient Environment of Foetus and the Prediction about Apgar Score ( Analysis of 173 Cases )
sentences.cn: 胎儿分娩环境与生后Apgar评分的临床探讨 ( 附173例分析 )

sentences.en: The womb ; the female organ in which the foetus grows during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 女性器官—间儿在子宫面生长.

sentences.en: To explore the effect of foetus education musical stimulate on infant development quotient.
sentences.cn: 了解胎教音乐刺激对婴幼儿发育商的影响.

sentences.en: Using a scanner, we can look at the unborn foetus.
sentences.cn: 我们用扫描器可以观察未出生的胎儿.

trans.tran_en: a baby or young animal before it is born
